



```{r}
library(readxl)
library(dplyr)
```


```{r}
df <- read_excel("FINAL GDP - CONSTANT.xlsx")

# Remove empty rows
df <- df %>% filter(!is.na(Item))

# Force numeric conversion
df_numeric <- df %>%
  mutate(across(-Item, ~as.numeric(.)))

# Select numeric year columns
years <- df_numeric %>% select(-Item) %>% names()

# Compute Mean, SD, CV
results <- df_numeric %>%
  rowwise() %>%
  mutate(
    Mean = mean(c_across(all_of(years)), na.rm = TRUE),
    SD   = sd(c_across(all_of(years)), na.rm = TRUE),
    CV   = (SD / Mean) * 100
  ) %>%
  ungroup() %>%
  select(Sector = Item, Mean, SD, CV)


results
```
